name: Lost Fish
description:
Its all about staying alive, one hit of those creepy deep sea creatures kill you immediately. 

Enjoy!

  1. MOVEMENT:
    Player follows mouse position
  2. ATTACKS:
    Left Mouse Button: Simple "Underwater Gun"
    Right Mouse Button: Lazer Multi Gun 
    Space: Shockwave

Art, Music / Sound and Code are selfmade.

Link to music and more
